attributes.action: Philip G Hamm Stop the DVLA giving away my address to private companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Giving away my address by the DVLA Swansea is affecting my personal security.We have to register with this Government Department and they abuse the security selling off our name and address to private companies who are intersted in our private in monitary position. THIS MUST STOP

rejection.details: Please remove your name from the title of your petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
